title: Cultural Competency-Based Public Health Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of public health concepts and community engagement experience
context.additional_context: Mobile device-supported learning environment for community health activists, with enhanced cultural sensitivity training.

learning_goals: Learners can develop at least three types of culturally tailored health education materials.
Learners can design two culturally competent interview guides for community health needs assessments.
Learners can implement five communication strategies reflecting cultural contexts when delivering health information.

resources: Community Health Worker Interview Video Materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
